name: One Too Many Voices
text:
You must flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Wade Wilson → remove One Too Many Voices from the game.
Discard Klyntar Suit. If Klyntar Suit was not discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Shocking Entrance
text: "Surrender the Klyntar." -Killer Thrill When Revealed: Deal 3 indirect damage to the first player. [hazard] Boost: Deal 1 indirect damage to the first player.

name: Killer Thrill
text: [star] Killer Thrill gets +1 ATK for each adrenaline counter on her. Forced Interrupt: When the player phase ends, put 1 adrenaline counter on Killer Thrill. Then, if there are 2 or more adrenaline counters on her, remove them all and she activates. (Venompool's nemesis minion.)

name: Coldwar
text: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks you.) [star] While Killer Thrill is in play, Coldwar gets +1 ATK. Boost: After this activation, deal this card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Guzz
text: Plotting. (After this minion engages you, it schemes.) [star] While Killer Thrill is in play, Guzz gets +1 SCH. Boost: After this activation, deal this card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Psyche Warp
text: When Revealed: You take X damage where X is equal to the ATK of the ally with the highest printed ATK. Discard that ally. If no damage was taken this way, this card gains surge.
